markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Flexible](/Traits.aspx?ID=204)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 275 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

The armor is flexible enough that it doesn't hinder most actions. You don't apply its check penalty to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks.
name: Flexible
